item.text: When you see your neighbor’s ox or sheep going astray, do not ignore it; you must return it without fail to your neighbor.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="0251" class="">owner</st><n id="1" /> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> live <st data-num="07138 0413">near</st><n id="2" /> you or you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> who the owner is,<n id="3" /> then you must <st data-num="0622" class="">corral</st> the animal<n id="4" /> <st data-num="0413 08432">at</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and let it <st data-num="01961" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="0251" class="">owner</st> <st data-num="01875" class="">looks for</st> it; then you must <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> it to him.

You shall <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">the same</st> to his <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st>, his <st data-num="08071" class="">clothes</st>, or <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="09 0834">else</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">neighbor</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="06 04480">lost</st> and you have <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st>; you <st data-num="03201" class="">must</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05956" class="">refuse to get involved</st>.<n id="2" />
When you see your neighbor’s donkey or ox fallen along the road, do not ignore it; instead, you must be sure to help him get the animal on its feet again.
A woman must not wear men’s clothing, nor should a man dress up in women’s clothing, for anyone who does this is offensive to the Lord your God.

If you happen to notice a bird’s nest along the road, whether in a tree or on the ground, and there are chicks or eggs with the mother bird sitting on them, you must not take away a mother that is with her young.
You must be sure to let the mother go, but you may take the young for yourself. Do this so that it may go well with you and you may have a long life.
If you build a new house, you must construct a guardrail around your roof to avoid being culpable in the event someone should fall from it.
You must not plant your vineyard with two kinds of seed; otherwise the entire yield, both of the seed you plant and the produce of the vineyard, will be defiled.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02790" class="">plow</st> with an <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> and a <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st> harnessed <st data-num="03162" class="">together</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03847" class="">wear</st> <st data-num="08162" class="">clothing made</st> with <st data-num="06785" class="">wool</st> and <st data-num="06593" class="">linen</st> <st data-num="08162" class="">meshed</st> <st data-num="03162" class="">together</st>.<n id="1" />
You shall make yourselves tassels for the four corners of the clothing you wear.
Suppose a man marries a woman, sleeps with her, and then rejects her,

<st data-num="07760" class="">accusing</st> her of <st data-num="05949 01697">impropriety</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03318 05921 07451">defaming</st> her <st data-num="08034" class="">reputation</st><n id="2" /> by <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “I <st data-num="03947" class="">married</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> but when I <st data-num="07126 0413">approached</st> her <st data-num="07126 0413">for marital relations</st><n id="3" /> I <st data-num="04672" class="">discovered</st> she was <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="01331" class="">virgin</st>!”

Then the <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st> of the <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman</st> must <st data-num="03947 03318">produce</st> the <st data-num="01331 05291">evidence of virginity</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> at the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>.

The <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman’s</st> <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> must <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st>, “I <st data-num="05414 0802">gave</st> my <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> and he has <st data-num="08130" class="">rejected</st><n id="1" /> her.

<st data-num="02009" class="">Moreover</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> has <st data-num="07760" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">accusations</st> of <st data-num="05949" class="">impropriety</st> by <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, ‘I <st data-num="04672" class="">discovered</st> your <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> was <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="01331" class="">virgin</st>,’ but <st data-num="0428" class="">this</st> is the <st data-num="01331" class="">evidence of</st> my <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter’s</st> <st data-num="01331" class="">virginity</st>!” The <st data-num="08071" class="">cloth</st> must then be <st data-num="06566" class="">spread out</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st>.

The <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> of <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> must then <st data-num="03947" class="">seize</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> and <st data-num="03256" class="">punish</st><n id="1" /> him.

They will fine him 100 shekels of silver and give them to the young woman’s father, for the man who made the accusation ruined the reputation of an Israelite virgin. She will then become his wife, and he may never divorce her as long as he lives.
But if the accusation is true and the young woman was not a virgin,

the men of her city must bring the young woman to the door of her father’s house and stone her to death, for she has done a disgraceful thing in Israel by behaving like a prostitute while living in her father’s house. In this way you will purge the evil from among you.
If a man is discovered in bed with a married woman, both the man lying in bed with the woman and the woman herself must die; in this way you will purge the evil from Israel.
If a virgin is engaged to a man and another man meets her in the city and goes to bed with her,

you must <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> of <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="05619 068">stone</st> them to <st data-num="04191" class="">death</st>, the <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman</st> <st data-num="05921 01697 0834">because</st> she did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06817" class="">cry out</st> though in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05921 01697 0834">because</st> he <st data-num="06031" class="">violated</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">fiancée</st>;<n id="2" /> in this way you will <st data-num="01197" class="">purge</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="07130">from among</st> you.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">came across</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0781" class="">engaged</st> <st data-num="05291" class="">woman</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> and <st data-num="02388" class="">overpowered</st> her and <st data-num="07901 05973">raped</st><n id="2" /> her, then <st data-num="0905" class="">only</st> the <st data-num="0376 0834 07901 05973">rapist</st><n id="3" /> must <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">anything</st> to the <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman</st>—<st data-num="05291" class="">she</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">has done nothing</st> <st data-num="02399" class="">deserving</st> of <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st>. <st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">case</st> is <st data-num="03651" class="">the same</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">as when</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="06965 05921">attacks</st> <st data-num="07453" class="">another person</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07523 05315">murders</st> him,
for the man met her in the field and the engaged woman cried out, but there was no one to rescue her.
Suppose a man comes across a virgin who is not engaged and takes hold of her and sleeps with her and they are discovered.
The man who has slept with her must pay her father 50 shekels of silver and she must become his wife. Because he has humiliated her, he may never divorce her as long as he lives.
(23:1) A man may not marry his father’s former wife and in this way dishonor his father.
